raw_text: As an improvement, Ng and Cardie (2002a) and Ng (2004) train a separate model to classify an anaphor as either anaphoric or non-anaphoric

raw_text: The output of this classifier can be used either as a pre-filter (Ng and Cardie,2002a) so that non-anaphoric anaphors will not be precessed in the co reference system, or as a set of features in the co reference model (Ng, 2004)

raw_text: Traditional learning-based co reference resolvers operate by training a model for classifying whether two mentions are co-referring or not (e.g., Soon et al (2001), Ng and Cardie (2002b), Kehler et al (2004), Ponzetto and Strube (2006))
